We believe this price offers an excellent opportunity for you to experience all that this product has to offer. Please let us know if you're interested in exploring this further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer
